# This generates React build & uploads to GitHub Release name: Generate Artifacts & Deploy (React) on: workflow_dispatch: jobs: publish: name: Build React Artifact runs-on: ubuntu-latest steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 - name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: 18 cache: 'npm' - name: Install dependencies run: npm install - name: Build React app run: npm run build - name: Zip build folder run: | cd build zip -r ../react-build.zip . cd .. - name: Generate release tag version run: | sha_short=$(git rev-parse --short "$GITHUB_SHA") current_datetime=$(date +'%Y%m%d%H%M%S') echo "TAG_VERSION=$current_datetime-$sha_short" >> $GITHUB_ENV - name: Create Release & Upload Artifact uses: ncipollo/release-action@v1 with: artifacts: "react-build.zip" tag: ${{ env.TAG_VERSION }}
